useCase.name: Accessing Ingest Process Documentation

preconditions.precondition: Batch Submitter needs to navigate to EDRMS Documentation Section
Authentication for accessing Documentation is required

useCase.trigger: Batch Submitter navigates to EDRMS Documentation Section

mainSequence.step: Batch Submitter navigates to EDRMS Documentation Section
Batch Submitter provides Credentials to authenticate
EDRMS Website requests Ingest Process Docs
Documentation Server retrieves and returns the Documentation
Documentation Link is sent to EDRMS Website
Documentation Link is displayed to Batch Submitter
Batch Submitter clicks on Documentation Link
Batch Submitter is redirected to Ingest Process Documentation
Ingest Process Documentation is displayed to Batch Submitter
